title: Rotation - Parallel axis theorem for disks

content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the ratio of the two angular accelerations, <math alttext="the fraction alpha sub B, over alpha sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>?

topic.text: 5.6: Newton's Second Law in Rotational Form

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
